## CharityORG.getEqStats() method

Get stats of an equipment.

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  equipName | string | Name of equipment. |

**Returns:**

[EqStats](./bitburner.eqstats.md)
